name: stuccoed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered or decorated with stucco (= a type of plaster used for covering walls and ceilings, especially one that can be formed into decorative patterns): The main gallery has a circular, stuccoed ceiling. The events of the novel take place in a large stuccoed family house. See
stucco
More examplesFewer examplesThey live in a stuccoed house three storeys high.Natural light pours into the white stuccoed interior.Delightful stuccoed figures decorate the walls and alcoves.
